pages.text: Welcome to this modpack!$(br2)Before you continue with your adventure, you might want to ponder through this category.$(br2)It will explain a few details that are different to your usual Minecraft experience.

Create: Fresh Start is at its core a Vanilla+ modpack with heavy opinions about how things should be.$(br2)Therefore, this category will explain neat features, items and stylistic choises one might want to know more about or how they can be disabled.
